data.text: @patrick_sharkey what in the world is happening with that double y-axis
@ewrigleyfield @patrick_sharkey The masking/distancing policies in social spaces changed. Outbreaks have been traced to eating clubs (social spaces).
@patrick_sharkey Look at the US NYT map - itâ€™s the people and places with least contact with other social groups (most isolated) that are last ones still with cases spreading.
@patrick_sharkey @ewrigleyfield the eating clubs had their recruitment week. three students in my class got COVID after participating 🙃
@ewrigleyfield ~1% of undergrads are showing up newly positive every single day
@ewrigleyfield it's wild. nothing changed, students had been back for 10 days or so when it began
@patrick_sharkey Did testing change in mid-February...? You guys are on the semester system, right? That's a really striking graph
